irtrusbot

Class IrcEvent

  • Object
    • IrcEvent

  • public class IrcEvent
extends Object
    A class that describes an event occurring in the IrcBot/client processing - ranging from connection state changes to received data
    Author:
    crash

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcCommand command
      Field for a sent or received IRC Command object, for COMMAND type events - This is 'null' for inapplicable events.
      IrcDirection direction
      Indicates whether the Command/Message was incoming or outgoing, etc for COMMAND and CHAT events.
      int idata
      additional integer data associated with the event, if any.
      IrcState lastState
      The previous bot state at the time the Event was dispatched
      IrcMessage message
      Field for a sent or received IRC Message (PRIVMSG) object, for CHAT type events - This is 'null' for inapplicable events.
      int priority_max
      Largest (in value) priority level plugin this event can be dispatched to.
      int priority_min
      Smallest (in value) priority level plugin this event can be dispatched to.
      String sdata
      additional string data associated with the event, if any.
      IrcState state
      The current bot state at the time the Event was dispatched
      IrcEventType type
      The type of event being handled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcEvent(IrcEventType t, IrcState ls, IrcState s, IrcCommand ic)
      Constructs an Event from type, state, and command information Note: attempts automatic interpretation of IRC Commands to Messages if applicable.

        Field for a sent or received IRC Command object, for COMMAND type events - This is 'null' for inapplicable events.

      • sdata

        public String sdata
        additional string data associated with the event, if any.

      • idata

        public int idata
        additional integer data associated with the event, if any.

      • priority_min

        public int priority_min
        Smallest (in value) priority level plugin this event can be dispatched to.
        For example: If you want an event to only be dispatched to RAW and FILTER plugins, you would set priority_min=IrcPluginPriority.RAW and priority_max=IrcPluginPriority.getLastElementInLevel(IrcPluginPriority.FILTER) (or IrcPluginPriority.FILTER+IrcPluginPriority.LEVEL_ELEMENTS-1)

      • priority_max

        public int priority_max
        Largest (in value) priority level plugin this event can be dispatched to.
        NOTE: This is the maximum priority level number. If you choose a specific level value, then you will include only the plugin with that exact level number, not all plugins in the priority level.
        For example: If you want an event to only be dispatched to RAW and FILTER plugins, you would set priority_min=IrcPluginPriority.RAW and priority_max=IrcPluginPriority.getLastElementInLevel(IrcPluginPriority.FILTER) (or IrcPluginPriority.FILTER+IrcPluginPriority.LEVEL_ELEMENTS-1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • IrcEvent

        public IrcEvent(IrcEventType t,
                IrcState ls,
                IrcState s,
                IrcCommand ic)
        Constructs an Event from type, state, and command information Note: attempts automatic interpretation of IRC Commands to Messages if applicable.
        Parameters:
        t - The type of the event being dispatched.
        ls - The previous bot state at the time the Event was dispatched
        s - The current bot state at the time the Event was dispatched
        ic - A sent or received IRC Command object, for COMMAND type messages. This should be set to 'null' if it is not applicable.
